attributes.title: no
attributes.review: downloaded this app to expand my news outlets and to see what all the hype about 🍊 was. very disappointed in product digital design and spam. the graphics hurt my eyes and do not accurately portray what is currently being marketed towards its targeted audience. the purpose of the news is to expand perspective and this app and its source shows numerous limitations including bias, limited content, and unproven/skewed data.

attributes.title: Hispanic lives MATTER
attributes.review: This app took FOREVER TO LOADDDD almost 2 hours!!! & my wifi is really good, this app is junk! It kept freezing & glitching most of the time, I’m telling you! Don’t get it, it’s just a waste of your time!!

attributes.title: pooey
